title: Iterative Problem-Solving Workshop for Creative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course for in-service elementary teachers to strengthen creative instructional design competencies

learning_goals: Learners design three or more iterative problem-solving cycles per science subject to develop creative lesson plans
Learners revise and improve two instructional design prototypes through peer feedback and self-reflection
Learners produce three types of creative teaching materials (quizzes/experiment kits/infographics, etc.) using one or more digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
